qas.question: In which point did the drainage basin of the Amazon split?

answers.text: During the mid-Eocene, it is believed that the drainage basin of the Amazon was split along the middle of the continent by the Purus Arch.

qas.question: In which direction did the water on the eastern side flow?

answers.text: Water on the eastern side flowed toward the Atlantic,

qas.question: What is the name of the basin that was created from a enclosed lake?
How long ago was it when the water broke through the Purus Arch?
Where did it join in the direction of its flow?

answers.text: joining the easterly flow toward the Atlantic.

qas.question: When was the drainage basin of the Amazon believed to have split in the middle of South America?
Where did water to the east of the Amazon drainage basin flow towards?
Where did water to the west of the Amazon drainage basin flow towards?
What did water that flowed towards the Pacific have to flow across during the mid-Eocene?
What basin was formed when the Andes Mountains rose?

Where did water on the eastern side of the amazon basin travel after the split?
Where did the water in the Amazon Basin flow towards when moving west?
What is the lake known as which was created by the rise of the Andes Mountains?
What split the Amazon drainage basin along the northern part of the continent?
Water on the eastern side float away from what ocean?
Water on the west side flowed below the basin and towards which ocean?
The Rocky Mountains enclosed a late creating what basing?
Water from broke through and joined the westward flow to the Pacific?

context: <a0_0><a0_1><a5_0><a5_1><a5_2> Suốt trong <a10_0><a10_1> các <a0_2><a10_2> giữa Eocene <a10_2/><a10_1/><a10_0/><a5_2/><a5_1/><a5_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/> , người ta tin rằng các lưu vực thoát nước của Amazon đã được chia <a11_1> dọc theo giữa <a11_1/> của lục địa bởi <a11_0><a11_2><b15_0> Purus Arch <a11_2/><a11_0/> . <b15_0/><a0_0/><a1_0> Nước ở phía đông chảy <a1_1><a1_2> về phía <a6_0><a6_1><a12_0><a12_1> các <a12_2><b16_0> Đại Tây Dương <b16_0/><a12_2/><a12_1/><a12_0/><a6_1/><a6_0/><a1_2/><a1_1/> , <a1_0/> trong khi nước phía tây chảy về phía <a7_0><a7_1><a13_0><a13_1> các <a7_2><a13_2><b17_0> Thái Bình Dương <b17_0/><a13_2/><a13_1/><a13_0/><a7_2/><a7_1/><a7_0/> đi qua <a8_0><a8_1> Amazonas Basin <a8_1/><a8_0/> . Như <a8_2> núi Andes <a8_2/> hoa hồng, tuy nhiên, một lưu vực lớn đã được tạo ra bao quanh một hồ nước; bây giờ được gọi là <a9_0> các <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><a9_1><a9_2><a14_0><a14_1><a14_2><b18_0><b19_0> Solimões Basin <b19_0/><b18_0/><a14_2/><a14_1/><a14_0/><a9_2/><a9_1/><a9_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> . <a3_0><a3_1> Trong <a3_2> 5–10 triệu năm qua <a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/> , nước tích tụ này xuyên qua vòm Purus, <a4_0> tham gia <a4_1> các <a4_2> đông đúc <a4_2/> lưu lượng <a4_1/> về phía <a6_2> Đại Tây Dương <a6_2/> .
